title: One potato, two potato
creator_credit: Leslie Daiken and British Film Institute
brief_description: The title is a children’s counting out rhyme; the film records London children at play; yet what they do, and how they amuse themselves, and the uncanny skill and lore which they pass on from age to age, make them children playing games in any city.
description: The title is a children’s counting out rhyme; the film records London children at play; yet what they do, and how they amuse themselves, and the uncanny skill and lore which they pass on from age to age, make them children playing games in any city.
